short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Alerts you whenever someone writes in TWHL.info's shoutbox.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Half-Life modding community at https://twhl.info has a web chat called the Shoutbox. This extension shows a browser notification whenever someone writes something in the Shoutbox. If you don't want notifications for your own messages, enter your username in the extension options.
